data.title: Moore Threads Reports Significant Revenue Growth for 2025
data.description:
Moore Threads has announced its financial results for 2025, revealing a substantial increase in revenue. According to Odaily, the company achieved an operating income of 1,505.5251 million yuan, marking a 243.37% rise compared to the previous year. Despite this growth, the net profit attributable to the parent company was a loss of 1,024.3113 million yuan, which represents a 36.70% reduction in losses from the prior year.

At the end of the reporting period, Moore Threads' total assets amounted to 15,307.823 million yuan, reflecting a 116.14% increase from the beginning of the period. The owner's equity attributable to the parent company reached 11,435.4793 million yuan, showing a growth of 154.69% from the start of the reporting period.

data.title: Germany Expects U.S. Tariffs on EU Products to Remain Within 2025 Agreement
data.description: Germany's government spokesperson has indicated that the country anticipates future U.S. tariffs on European Union products will not exceed the limits set by the tariff agreement reached in 2025. According to Jin10, this expectation reflects ongoing diplomatic efforts to maintain stable trade relations between the United States and the European Union. The spokesperson emphasized the importance of adhering to international agreements to ensure economic stability and foster positive bilateral relations. This statement comes amid broader discussions on trade policies and their impact on global markets.

data.title: Cryptocurrency Trader Resumes High-Leverage ETH Long Positions
data.description:
A cryptocurrency trader known as 'Machi' Huang Licheng has initiated a new round of high-leverage Ethereum (ETH) long positions. According to PANews, after a previous liquidation, the trader deposited approximately $250,000 to establish an ETH long position. Over three days, the position was expanded to $13.5 million through continuous rolling of positions. Currently, the trader holds a 25x leveraged ETH long position with an average price of $1,945, showing an unrealized profit of about $430,000, with a liquidation price around $1,938.

Recent trading activity from this address shows a pattern of building positions with hundreds of thousands of dollars and increasing the scale and average price through rolling positions. However, these attempts often end in liquidation due to high average prices and market pullbacks. After liquidation, the trader typically deposits more funds to restart the process, possibly aiming for a significant rebound or the start of a bull market. Since October last year, the address has attempted long positions on various cryptocurrencies 162 times, including 18 attempts on ETH, with a total net deposit of approximately $15.68 million to Hyperliquid. Almost every deposit has resulted in a loss.

data.title: Art Collections Show Similar Patterns Across Different Owners
data.description: Art collections around the world are displaying striking similarities, with many featuring subtle, abstract, and occasionally spiritual pieces. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting the trend where individual collections often mirror each other in style and composition. This phenomenon raises questions about the influences shaping collectors' choices and the broader art market dynamics. As collectors seek unique pieces, the prevalence of similar themes suggests a shared aesthetic preference or influence from popular trends. The art world continues to evolve, yet these recurring patterns in collections indicate a convergence in taste among art enthusiasts.

data.title: Coinbase will launch Robo Token (ROBO) perpetual futures trading.
data.description: According to a Coinbase Markets announcement, perpetual futures trading for Robo Token (ROBO) will launch on February 27th. Subject to liquidity requirements, the ROBO-PERP market will open in supported regions. Retail traders can trade perpetual futures through Coinbase Advanced in selected jurisdictions, while institutional clients can access it directly through Coinbase International Exchange.

data.title: U.S. Navy Addresses Reports of Toilet Issues on USS Ford Aircraft Carrier
data.description:
The U.S. Navy has issued a statement on its official website addressing media reports about alleged toilet issues on the USS Ford aircraft carrier. According to Jin10, the statement clarified that the systems aboard the USS Ford are functioning normally and meet the expected standards for a Ford-class carrier accommodating over 4,000 personnel. During its current deployment, the vacuum waste system on the USS Ford has reportedly handled over six million flushes.

However, Captain Skarosi of the USS Ford acknowledged that there have been instances of toilet blockages. He assured that engineering personnel have responded swiftly, minimizing the impact and duration of these issues. Recent media reports have claimed that nearly 90% of the approximately 650 toilets on the carrier are out of service, with only a few operational. It was reported that over 4,600 sailors have had to queue for toilet access, sometimes waiting over 45 minutes.

data.title: Experts Criticize Tax Authorities for Lacking Basic Management Knowledge of Crypto Assets
data.description: Experts have criticized a recent incident involving tax authorities, highlighting a significant lack of basic management knowledge regarding crypto assets. According to ChainCatcher, the event has been likened to 'opening a wallet and inviting others to take money.' This criticism underscores the need for improved understanding and handling of digital currencies by regulatory bodies.

data.title: Forward Industries Faces Significant Losses Amid Solana Price Decline
data.description:
Forward Industries, the largest institutional holder of Solana (SOL), is experiencing nearly $1 billion in unrealized losses due to a significant drop in SOL's price. According to NS3.AI, the cryptocurrency's value has decreased by approximately 62% from the company's average purchase price. This decline has adversely affected Forward Industries' balance sheet and stock price. Despite these challenges, the company remains committed to its long-term strategy, aspiring to become the 'Berkshire Hathaway of the Solana ecosystem.'

The situation highlights broader issues within the digital asset treasury model, as other similar firms are also reporting paper losses. These challenges come amid ongoing efforts to develop the ecosystem, including initiatives like the launch of Solana Payments.

data.title: South Fund Management Warns Investors of Premium Risk in Oil Fund
data.description: South Fund Management Co., Ltd. has issued a notice regarding significant price fluctuations in its Southern Oil Securities Investment Fund A shares. According to Jin10, the fund's secondary market trading price has experienced considerable volatility. On February 25, 2026, the net asset value of the fund shares was 1.2477 yuan, while the closing price on February 27, 2026, was 1.439 yuan, significantly higher than the net asset value. Investors are advised to be cautious of the premium risk in secondary market trading prices. Blind investments in fund shares with high premium rates could lead to substantial losses.

data.title: Bitget has launched USD-margined ROBO perpetual contracts with leverage ranging from 1x to 20x.
data.description: According to the official announcement, Bitget has launched USDT-margined ROBO perpetual contracts with leverage ranging from 1x to 20x. Contract trading on BOT will be available simultaneously.

data.title: EU Commission President to Meet Dutch Prime Minister on Tuesday
data.description: The European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen is scheduled to meet with the Dutch Prime Minister on Tuesday. According to Jin10, this meeting is part of ongoing discussions between EU leaders. The agenda is expected to cover various topics of mutual interest and cooperation within the European Union. Further details on the specific issues to be addressed during the meeting have not been disclosed.

data.title: European Approval Granted for Moderna's Combination Flu and Covid Vaccine
data.description: European regulators have given the green light to Moderna's innovative flu and Covid-19 combination vaccine. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting this development as a significant win for Moderna, which has encountered substantial opposition to its new vaccines in the United States. The approval marks a pivotal moment for the company as it seeks to expand its market presence amid challenges in the U.S. vaccine landscape. Moderna's efforts to introduce novel immunizations have faced hurdles, but the European endorsement could bolster its position in the global vaccine market.

data.title: Beast Industries Expands into DeFi with Ethereum Focus and Major Investment
data.description: Jeff Housenbold, CEO of Beast Industries, emphasizes Ethereum's significant contribution to the stablecoin ecosystem and the expansion of decentralized finance (DeFi). According to NS3.AI, Beast Industries, recognized for the MrBeast brand, is diversifying into financial products after acquiring fintech company Step. The company aims to improve financial literacy through gamification. Additionally, Beast Industries has secured a $200 million investment from Bitmine, indicating robust institutional support for its cryptocurrency initiatives.

data.title: Marathon Digital and Block Experience Gains Amid Mixed Q4 Earnings
data.description: Marathon Digital Holdings (MARA) and Block reported double-digit gains in pre-market trading after releasing mixed fourth-quarter earnings results. According to NS3.AI, the financial outcomes reveal a contrast between companies that are benefiting from the expansion of artificial intelligence and those experiencing margin pressure. Meanwhile, CoreWeave, a cloud computing firm, saw a significant decline during the same session.

data.title: Poll Reveals Majority of Americans Doubt Economic Prosperity Claims
data.description: A recent poll indicates that 68% of Americans do not believe U.S. President Donald Trump's assertions that the American economy is thriving. According to Jin10, the survey also reveals that 82% of respondents perceive significant inflation in the country. These findings highlight a disconnect between public perception and official economic statements.

data.title: UK Prime Minister Starmer Expresses Disappointment Over By-Election Results
data.description: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has expressed his disappointment following the recent by-election results. According to Jin10, Starmer acknowledged the frustration of voters, stating that the outcome was far from what the party had hoped for. The by-election, which was seen as a critical test for the ruling party, did not yield favorable results, prompting Starmer to address the concerns of the electorate. The Prime Minister emphasized the importance of understanding and addressing the issues that led to voter dissatisfaction, as the party seeks to regain public trust and support in future elections.

data.title: Chinese Companies Expand Lithium Operations in Zimbabwe
data.description: Chinese companies are advancing their lithium production capabilities in Zimbabwe with the development of a third facility. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting the strategic move as part of China's broader efforts to secure essential resources for its growing electric vehicle industry. This expansion underscores the increasing importance of lithium as a critical component in battery technology, which is pivotal for the global shift towards renewable energy and electric transportation. The new plant is expected to bolster Zimbabwe's position as a key player in the lithium market, attracting further investment and enhancing its economic prospects.

data.title: EU Approves €110 Million Aid for French Clean Tech Manufacturing
data.description: The European Union has sanctioned a €110 million aid package to support clean technology manufacturing in France. According to Jin10, this initiative aims to bolster the country's efforts in advancing sustainable technology and reducing carbon emissions. The funding is expected to enhance the production capabilities of French companies involved in clean tech, contributing to the EU's broader environmental goals. This move aligns with the EU's commitment to fostering innovation and sustainability within its member states.

data.title: Prediction Markets Outperform Traditional Polls with High Accuracy
data.description: Prediction markets, including platforms like Polymarket, are surpassing traditional polling methods in accuracy due to the financial commitment of participants who wager real money on outcomes. According to NS3.AI, research indicates that prediction markets can achieve up to 91% accuracy as events approach resolution, highlighting their effectiveness compared to the repeated failures of traditional polls, such as those seen in the 2016 U.S. election. Institutional investors are increasingly supporting these markets, recognizing their potential despite ongoing challenges related to participant diversity and the risks of market manipulation.

data.title: Moore Threads: 2025 losses narrowed by 36.70% year-on-year.
data.description: Moore Threads announced that in 2025, the company achieved operating revenue of RMB 1,505,525,100, a year-on-year increase of 243.37%; net profit attributable to owners of the parent company was RMB -1,024,311,300, a 36.70% reduction in losses compared to the same period last year. At the end of the reporting period, the company's total assets were RMB 15,307,823,000, an increase of 116.14% compared to the beginning of the reporting period; equity attributable to owners of the parent company was RMB 11,435,479,300, an increase of 154.69% compared to the beginning of the reporting period. (Jinshi)
